text:
mAqtara#~jca puqtraM caq vi garBa#M ca jaqrAyu# ca || 
baqhistE# astuq bAliti# || 
uqruqdraqPsO viqSvarU#paq induqH pava#mAnOq dhIra# Ana~jjaq garBa$M ||
Eka#padI dviqpadI$ triqpadIq catu#ShpadIq pa~jca#padIq ShaTpa#dI 
saqptapa#dyaqShTApa#dIq BuvaqnA&nu# prathatAq(gg)q svAhA$ || 
maqhI dyauH pRu#thiqvI ca# na iqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM mi#mikShatAM | 
piqpRuqtAnnOq BarI#maBiH || 31
(gaqviqnyau# vi - catu#ScatvAri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
